plot: Alexis, Gretchen and Peggy get together for a day of shopping and socializing. The dinner conversation turns racy when the women share surprising sexual secrets. Alexis and her family head to San Diego for a family vacation; however, the trip turns out to be anything but relaxing for her. Tamra wants to take steps to repair her friendship with Vicki and suggests a girls' weekend in Cabo San Lucas.—Anonymous
